Because of these times, adventure is put on hold."},{"lineNumber":260760,"originalJapaneseLine":"冒険用の艤装は中止して、今は輸送用に改造するの","translatedEnglishLine":"The adventure outfitting is canceled and will be remodeled for transport now."},{"lineNumber":260761,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにー","translatedEnglishLine":"What—?"},{"lineNumber":260762,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍との戦争で兵や物資輸送の足はいくらでも必要だからね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Because of the war with the demon army, we need as much transport for troops and supplies as possible."},{"lineNumber":260763,"originalJapaneseLine":"この船にもそちら方面で活躍してもらわないと","translatedEnglishLine":"This ship also has to be put to use in that capacity."},{"lineNumber":260764,"originalJapaneseLine":"駄目だ、これはお前が俺の為に作ってくれた冒険用だろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"No way, this was made for adventure, for me."},{"lineNumber":260765,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにその目的で使う。いいな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll use it for that purpose. Got it?"},{"lineNumber":260766,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも・・","translatedEnglishLine":"But..."},{"lineNumber":260767,"originalJapaneseLine":"任せろ、魔軍は俺が蹴散らしてやるから。","translatedEnglishLine":"Leave it to me; I’ll scatter the demon army."},{"lineNumber":260768,"originalJapaneseLine":"この船は予定通り、俺様用にかっこよく仕上げろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Finish this ship stylishly for me as planned."},{"lineNumber":260769,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイから解放され・・とぼとぼと歩くセシル","translatedEnglishLine":"Cecil, freed from Rei, walks along listlessly."},{"lineNumber":260770,"originalJapaneseLine":"街道で・・アリオスと出会う","translatedEnglishLine":"On the road... encounters Arios."},{"lineNumber":260771,"originalJapaneseLine":"会いたかった・・魔軍が攻めてきているんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I wanted to see you... The demon army is attacking."},{"lineNumber":260772,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたに言われた通り、私は自由都市を守っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Just as you said, I am defending the Free City."},{"lineNumber":260773,"originalJapaneseLine":"一緒に戦って欲しい、あなたが居てくれたら、あの時のように今回もきっと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I want you to fight alongside me. If you are here, surely, like last time, this time too..."},{"lineNumber":260774,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、アリスは他人行儀・・冷たい目でセシルを見る","translatedEnglishLine":"But Alice acts distant... looks at Cecil with cold eyes."},{"lineNumber":260775,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうしたの、一緒に・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"What's wrong? Together..."},{"lineNumber":260776,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市を守る隊長、信頼も厚く魔軍をかなり食い止めていると聞く・・・迷惑だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I hear you're the captain defending the Free City, highly trusted and holding back the demon army a lot... It’s a nuisance."},{"lineNumber":260777,"originalJapaneseLine":"さっさと今の任を放棄して山奥にでも隠れていろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Quickly abandon your current post and hide somewhere deep in the mountains."},{"lineNumber":260778,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか出来ないか、なら・・世界の為、この場で斬らせてもらう","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, you can't. Then... for the world’s sake, I will cut you down here."},{"lineNumber":260779,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうして・・訳がわからず混乱するセシルに一方的に攻撃してくるアリオス","translatedEnglishLine":"Why... Arios attacks Cecil unilaterally, who is confused and doesn’t understand."},{"lineNumber":260780,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tアリオスは[テオマン参戦]は発生しているが[テオマン妨害１]が発生しているかどうかは不明","translatedEnglishLine":"Arios is involved in [Teoman's Participation], but it's unclear whether [Teoman Disturbance 1] has occurred."},{"lineNumber":260781,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tどっちでもいけるような感じで表現してもらえたらと","translatedEnglishLine":"I hope it can be expressed so either direction works."},{"lineNumber":260782,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tアリオスとセシルの関係は、ああ、元恋人同士なんだなぁと分かるように","translatedEnglishLine":"The relationship between Arios and Cecil should convey that, ah, they are former lovers."},{"lineNumber":260783,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tセシルはレイにレイプされた後なので心が弱くなっています、そんな時に元恋人と出会い","translatedEnglishLine":"Cecil’s spirit is weakened after being raped by Rei; at such a time she meets her ex-lover."},{"lineNumber":260784,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tその恋人にも刃を向けられる・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"And even that lover turns a blade against her..."},{"lineNumber":260785,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにランスが通りかかり、アリオスの剣を受け止めて助ける、今は戦う必要は無いとアリオスは立ち去る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then Rance comes by, blocks Arios’ sword and helps, telling Arios there is no need to fight now, and Arios leaves."},{"lineNumber":260786,"originalJapaneseLine":"むむ、アホ勇者だ、無事か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, that foolish hero, are you alright..."},{"lineNumber":260787,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か呆然としてセシル","translatedEnglishLine":"Cecil looks dazed and stunned."},{"lineNumber":260788,"originalJapaneseLine":"（アリオスの彼女か・・よし、美人だし、うまく恩を売ってこのまま寝取ってやる、落とすぞ）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Arios’ girlfriend, huh... Alright, she’s beautiful, I’ll skillfully ingratiate myself and steal her away.)"},{"lineNumber":260789,"originalJapaneseLine":"何があったのか分からないが、俺が来たからには安心だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t know what happened, but now that I’m here, you can feel safe."},{"lineNumber":260790,"originalJapaneseLine":"はっ・・と正気に戻る、ありがとう・・自由都市連合軍の隊長を勤めさせて貰っているセシルという","translatedEnglishLine":"Snaps back to reality, Thanks... I am Cecil, serving as captain of the Free Cities United Army."},{"lineNumber":260791,"originalJapaneseLine":"おお、君がそうか・・　俺は　世界総統ランスだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, so you are... I am Rance, the Supreme Leader of the World."},{"lineNumber":260792,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　セシルは動揺としているので少しおかしな受け答え・・必至で冷静さを取り戻そうとしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Cecil is disturbed, answers a bit oddly... desperately trying to regain composure."},{"lineNumber":260793,"originalJapaneseLine":"今、自由都市の司令部Ｍランドに向かっている、ここで合わなくてもそこで合う事になっていたのだな","translatedEnglishLine":"Right now, heading to the Free City headquarters M-Land; even if not meeting here, we're meant to meet there."},{"lineNumber":260794,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんという運命。これは運命だとうれしそうなランス","translatedEnglishLine":"What fate. This is destiny, says a joyful Rance."},{"lineNumber":260795,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達はＭランドに到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and company arrive at M-Land."},{"lineNumber":260796,"originalJapaneseLine":"さっそくセシルを口説く為に宿に連れていこうとしたが、自由都市軍の兵士が現れ","translatedEnglishLine":"He tried to take Cecil to an inn to seduce her right away, but Free City soldiers appeared."},{"lineNumber":260797,"originalJapaneseLine":"セシル隊長、ご無事でしたが、うんぬん・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Captain Cecil, you are safe, and so on..."},{"lineNumber":260798,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人に捕まったという事で心配していたのだけど・・そうですか、総統閣下が・・","translatedEnglishLine":"We were worried because you were captured by a demon... Is that so, Supreme Leader?"},{"lineNumber":260799,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、助けてはない、途中で出会ったのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I didn’t rescue her; we just met on the way."},{"lineNumber":260800,"originalJapaneseLine":"ならどうやって脱出を・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Then how did you escape...?"},{"lineNumber":260801,"originalJapaneseLine":"解放された・・魔人レイに・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I was released... by the demon Rei..."},{"lineNumber":260802,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっ、どういう","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh? What do you mean?"},{"lineNumber":260803,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、それよりまずは司令部へ","translatedEnglishLine":"No, first, let's go to the headquarters."},{"lineNumber":260804,"originalJapaneseLine":"と連れていかれる。","translatedEnglishLine":"And he is taken along."},{"lineNumber":260805,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、後で口説けばいいかと少し余裕のランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, Rance thinks he can seduce her later and is a bit relaxed."},{"lineNumber":260806,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ポイント","translatedEnglishLine":"Points."},{"lineNumber":260807,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　セシルの精神状態はまだ不安定。対応が曖昧","translatedEnglishLine":"Cecil’s mental state is still unstable. Responses are vague."},{"lineNumber":260808,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　部下達はセシルの無事を喜ぶが、魔人レイに解放されたと知ると不審がる者が居る","translatedEnglishLine":"The subordinates are glad Cecil is safe, but some are suspicious upon learning she was freed by demon Rei."},{"lineNumber":260809,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリアが１２台のチューリップ３号Ｈ型をさっそくいじっている","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria is already tinkering with twelve Type 3 H-model Tulips."},{"lineNumber":260810,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ使えないのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"What? Are they unusable?"},{"lineNumber":260811,"originalJapaneseLine":"使えるようにする為の最終調整が必要なの、急いでも数日はかかるわ","translatedEnglishLine":"They need final adjustments to become usable; even if rushed, it will take several days."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大河に面しているので交易が盛ん、最大の造船会社もある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Facing a great river, trade is thriving, and there is also the largest shipbuilding company.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 造船会社のイメージは任せます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll leave the image of the shipbuilding company to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＣＧ：ランス船団／出発前＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <CG: Rance Fleet / Before Departure>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンかマリアが説明、もしくは汎用キャラを建造責任者として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon or Maria will explain, or a generic character will act as the construction manager.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日本丸、海王丸の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the Nippon Maru and Kaiō Maru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまでの海探索で作られた冒険船の中では最大クラス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the adventure ships built for sea exploration so far, it is one of the largest classes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがコパンドンお金持ちと分かる感じで・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As expected of Copandon, it clearly shows he's wealthy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうすぐ完成なんやけど、ここまでや。こういう時代だから冒険は後回し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It will be completed soon, but this is as far as it goes. Because of these times, adventure is put on hold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冒険用の艤装は中止して、今は輸送用に改造するの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The adventure outfitting is canceled and will be remodeled for transport now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What—?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍との戦争で兵や物資輸送の足はいくらでも必要だからね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of the war with the demon army, we need as much transport for troops and supplies as possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この船にもそちら方面で活躍してもらわないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This ship also has to be put to use in that capacity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目だ、これはお前が俺の為に作ってくれた冒険用だろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, this was made for adventure, for me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにその目的で使う。いいな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll use it for that purpose. Got it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 任せろ、魔軍は俺が蹴散らしてやるから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leave it to me; I’ll scatter the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この船は予定通り、俺様用にかっこよく仕上げろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finish this ship stylishly for me as planned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイから解放され・・とぼとぼと歩くセシル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil, freed from Rei, walks along listlessly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街道で・・アリオスと出会う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the road... encounters Arios.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会いたかった・・魔軍が攻めてきているんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wanted to see you... The demon army is attacking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたに言われた通り、私は自由都市を守っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as you said, I am defending the Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒に戦って欲しい、あなたが居てくれたら、あの時のように今回もきっと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to fight alongside me. If you are here, surely, like last time, this time too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、アリスは他人行儀・・冷たい目でセシルを見る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Alice acts distant... looks at Cecil with cold eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしたの、一緒に・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's wrong? Together...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市を守る隊長、信頼も厚く魔軍をかなり食い止めていると聞く・・・迷惑だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hear you're the captain defending the Free City, highly trusted and holding back the demon army a lot... It’s a nuisance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっさと今の任を放棄して山奥にでも隠れていろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Quickly abandon your current post and hide somewhere deep in the mountains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか出来ないか、なら・・世界の為、この場で斬らせてもらう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, you can't. Then... for the world’s sake, I will cut you down here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうして・・訳がわからず混乱するセシルに一方的に攻撃してくるアリオス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why... Arios attacks Cecil unilaterally, who is confused and doesn’t understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスは[テオマン参戦]は発生しているが[テオマン妨害１]が発生しているかどうかは不明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios is involved in [Teoman's Participation], but it's unclear whether [Teoman Disturbance 1] has occurred.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっちでもいけるような感じで表現してもらえたらと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hope it can be expressed so either direction works.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスとセシルの関係は、ああ、元恋人同士なんだなぁと分かるように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The relationship between Arios and Cecil should convey that, ah, they are former lovers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルはレイにレイプされた後なので心が弱くなっています、そんな時に元恋人と出会い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil’s spirit is weakened after being raped by Rei; at such a time she meets her ex-lover.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その恋人にも刃を向けられる・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And even that lover turns a blade against her...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにランスが通りかかり、アリオスの剣を受け止めて助ける、今は戦う必要は無いとアリオスは立ち去る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Rance comes by, blocks Arios’ sword and helps, telling Arios there is no need to fight now, and Arios leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむ、アホ勇者だ、無事か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, that foolish hero, are you alright...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か呆然としてセシル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil looks dazed and stunned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （アリオスの彼女か・・よし、美人だし、うまく恩を売ってこのまま寝取ってやる、落とすぞ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Arios’ girlfriend, huh... Alright, she’s beautiful, I’ll skillfully ingratiate myself and steal her away.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何があったのか分からないが、俺が来たからには安心だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t know what happened, but now that I’m here, you can feel safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はっ・・と正気に戻る、ありがとう・・自由都市連合軍の隊長を勤めさせて貰っているセシルという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Snaps back to reality, Thanks... I am Cecil, serving as captain of the Free Cities United Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、君がそうか・・　俺は　世界総統ランスだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, so you are... I am Rance, the Supreme Leader of the World.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルは動揺としているので少しおかしな受け答え・・必至で冷静さを取り戻そうとしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil is disturbed, answers a bit oddly... desperately trying to regain composure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、自由都市の司令部Ｍランドに向かっている、ここで合わなくてもそこで合う事になっていたのだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now, heading to the Free City headquarters M-Land; even if not meeting here, we're meant to meet there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんという運命。これは運命だとうれしそうなランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What fate. This is destiny, says a joyful Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はＭランドに到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and company arrive at M-Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっそくセシルを口説く為に宿に連れていこうとしたが、自由都市軍の兵士が現れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He tried to take Cecil to an inn to seduce her right away, but Free City soldiers appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシル隊長、ご無事でしたが、うんぬん・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Captain Cecil, you are safe, and so on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人に捕まったという事で心配していたのだけど・・そうですか、総統閣下が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We were worried because you were captured by a demon... Is that so, Supreme Leader?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、助けてはない、途中で出会ったのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I didn’t rescue her; we just met on the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならどうやって脱出を・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then how did you escape...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 解放された・・魔人レイに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was released... by the demon Rei...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、どういう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? What do you mean?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、それよりまずは司令部へ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, first, let's go to the headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と連れていかれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And he is taken along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、後で口説けばいいかと少し余裕のランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, Rance thinks he can seduce her later and is a bit relaxed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポイント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Points.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルの精神状態はまだ不安定。対応が曖昧
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil’s mental state is still unstable. Responses are vague.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下達はセシルの無事を喜ぶが、魔人レイに解放されたと知ると不審がる者が居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The subordinates are glad Cecil is safe, but some are suspicious upon learning she was freed by demon Rei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアが１２台のチューリップ３号Ｈ型をさっそくいじっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria is already tinkering with twelve Type 3 H-model Tulips.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ使えないのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? Are they unusable?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使えるようにする為の最終調整が必要なの、急いでも数日はかかるわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They need final adjustments to become usable; even if rushed, it will take several days.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Are they unusable?"},{"lineNumber":260811,"originalJapaneseLine":"使えるようにする為の最終調整が必要なの、急いでも数日はかかるわ","translatedEnglishLine":"They need final adjustments to become usable; even if rushed, it will take several days."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大河に面しているので交易が盛ん、最大の造船会社もある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Facing a great river, trade is thriving, and there is also the largest shipbuilding company.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 造船会社のイメージは任せます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll leave the image of the shipbuilding company to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＣＧ：ランス船団／出発前＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <CG: Rance Fleet / Before Departure>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンかマリアが説明、もしくは汎用キャラを建造責任者として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon or Maria will explain, or a generic character will act as the construction manager.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日本丸、海王丸の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the Nippon Maru and Kaiō Maru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまでの海探索で作られた冒険船の中では最大クラス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the adventure ships built for sea exploration so far, it is one of the largest classes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがコパンドンお金持ちと分かる感じで・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As expected of Copandon, it clearly shows he's wealthy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうすぐ完成なんやけど、ここまでや。こういう時代だから冒険は後回し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It will be completed soon, but this is as far as it goes. Because of these times, adventure is put on hold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冒険用の艤装は中止して、今は輸送用に改造するの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The adventure outfitting is canceled and will be remodeled for transport now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What—?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍との戦争で兵や物資輸送の足はいくらでも必要だからね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of the war with the demon army, we need as much transport for troops and supplies as possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この船にもそちら方面で活躍してもらわないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This ship also has to be put to use in that capacity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目だ、これはお前が俺の為に作ってくれた冒険用だろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, this was made for adventure, for me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにその目的で使う。いいな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll use it for that purpose. Got it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 任せろ、魔軍は俺が蹴散らしてやるから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leave it to me; I’ll scatter the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この船は予定通り、俺様用にかっこよく仕上げろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finish this ship stylishly for me as planned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイから解放され・・とぼとぼと歩くセシル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil, freed from Rei, walks along listlessly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街道で・・アリオスと出会う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the road... encounters Arios.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会いたかった・・魔軍が攻めてきているんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wanted to see you... The demon army is attacking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたに言われた通り、私は自由都市を守っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as you said, I am defending the Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒に戦って欲しい、あなたが居てくれたら、あの時のように今回もきっと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to fight alongside me. If you are here, surely, like last time, this time too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、アリスは他人行儀・・冷たい目でセシルを見る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Alice acts distant... looks at Cecil with cold eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしたの、一緒に・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's wrong? Together...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市を守る隊長、信頼も厚く魔軍をかなり食い止めていると聞く・・・迷惑だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hear you're the captain defending the Free City, highly trusted and holding back the demon army a lot... It’s a nuisance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっさと今の任を放棄して山奥にでも隠れていろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Quickly abandon your current post and hide somewhere deep in the mountains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか出来ないか、なら・・世界の為、この場で斬らせてもらう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, you can't. Then... for the world’s sake, I will cut you down here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうして・・訳がわからず混乱するセシルに一方的に攻撃してくるアリオス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why... Arios attacks Cecil unilaterally, who is confused and doesn’t understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスは[テオマン参戦]は発生しているが[テオマン妨害１]が発生しているかどうかは不明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios is involved in [Teoman's Participation], but it's unclear whether [Teoman Disturbance 1] has occurred.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっちでもいけるような感じで表現してもらえたらと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hope it can be expressed so either direction works.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスとセシルの関係は、ああ、元恋人同士なんだなぁと分かるように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The relationship between Arios and Cecil should convey that, ah, they are former lovers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルはレイにレイプされた後なので心が弱くなっています、そんな時に元恋人と出会い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil’s spirit is weakened after being raped by Rei; at such a time she meets her ex-lover.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その恋人にも刃を向けられる・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And even that lover turns a blade against her...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにランスが通りかかり、アリオスの剣を受け止めて助ける、今は戦う必要は無いとアリオスは立ち去る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Rance comes by, blocks Arios’ sword and helps, telling Arios there is no need to fight now, and Arios leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむ、アホ勇者だ、無事か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, that foolish hero, are you alright...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か呆然としてセシル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil looks dazed and stunned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （アリオスの彼女か・・よし、美人だし、うまく恩を売ってこのまま寝取ってやる、落とすぞ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Arios’ girlfriend, huh... Alright, she’s beautiful, I’ll skillfully ingratiate myself and steal her away.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何があったのか分からないが、俺が来たからには安心だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t know what happened, but now that I’m here, you can feel safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はっ・・と正気に戻る、ありがとう・・自由都市連合軍の隊長を勤めさせて貰っているセシルという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Snaps back to reality, Thanks... I am Cecil, serving as captain of the Free Cities United Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、君がそうか・・　俺は　世界総統ランスだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, so you are... I am Rance, the Supreme Leader of the World.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルは動揺としているので少しおかしな受け答え・・必至で冷静さを取り戻そうとしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil is disturbed, answers a bit oddly... desperately trying to regain composure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、自由都市の司令部Ｍランドに向かっている、ここで合わなくてもそこで合う事になっていたのだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now, heading to the Free City headquarters M-Land; even if not meeting here, we're meant to meet there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんという運命。これは運命だとうれしそうなランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What fate. This is destiny, says a joyful Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はＭランドに到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and company arrive at M-Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっそくセシルを口説く為に宿に連れていこうとしたが、自由都市軍の兵士が現れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He tried to take Cecil to an inn to seduce her right away, but Free City soldiers appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシル隊長、ご無事でしたが、うんぬん・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Captain Cecil, you are safe, and so on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人に捕まったという事で心配していたのだけど・・そうですか、総統閣下が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We were worried because you were captured by a demon... Is that so, Supreme Leader?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、助けてはない、途中で出会ったのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I didn’t rescue her; we just met on the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならどうやって脱出を・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then how did you escape...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 解放された・・魔人レイに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was released... by the demon Rei...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、どういう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? What do you mean?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、それよりまずは司令部へ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, first, let's go to the headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と連れていかれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And he is taken along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、後で口説けばいいかと少し余裕のランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, Rance thinks he can seduce her later and is a bit relaxed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポイント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Points.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルの精神状態はまだ不安定。対応が曖昧
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil’s mental state is still unstable. Responses are vague.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下達はセシルの無事を喜ぶが、魔人レイに解放されたと知ると不審がる者が居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The subordinates are glad Cecil is safe, but some are suspicious upon learning she was freed by demon Rei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアが１２台のチューリップ３号Ｈ型をさっそくいじっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria is already tinkering with twelve Type 3 H-model Tulips.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ使えないのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? Are they unusable?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使えるようにする為の最終調整が必要なの、急いでも数日はかかるわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They need final adjustments to become usable; even if rushed, it will take several days.
